an10.175:4.1: “Saparikkamano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano.
an10.175:4.2: Kathañca, bhikkhave, saparikkamano ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano?
an10.175:4.3: Pāṇātipātissa, bhikkhave, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:4.4: Adinnādāyissa, bhikkhave, adinnādānā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:4.5: Kāmesumicchācārissa, bhikkhave, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:4.6: Musāvādissa, bhikkhave, musāvādā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:4.7: Pisuṇavācassa, bhikkhave, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:4.8: Pharusavācassa, bhikkhave, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:4.9: Samphappalāpissa, bhikkhave, samphappalāpā veramaṇī parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:4.11: Byāpannacittassa, bhikkhave, abyāpādo parikkamanaṃ hoti.
an10.175:4.13: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, saparikkamano ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo aparikkamano”ti.
